categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Blackout" was the nickname of a stealth operations clone trooper commander assigned to High Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi of the Grand Army of the Republic towards the middle of the Clone Wars  to fight during the Battle of Christophsis. Blackout was one of the crew of a stealth ship along with CT-1284. His helmet was decorated with Jaig eyes, a battle honor given to those that have shown bravery on the field.

In 22 BBY, Blackout was a member of the crew assigned to an experimental stealth ship, under the command of Jedi General Anakin Skywalker, against the Confederacy Fleet under the command of Admiral Trench. He also served as a mentor for clone rookie CT-1284, nicknamed "Spark."
Hasbro made an action figure of Blackout, though it was named Stealth Operations Clone Trooper yet the mold and features were clearly of Blackout.
